name: The Vanderson Family Grave (2014 Prologue)
description:
A short project made in October 2014, this kinetic VN is about the first meeting of what will become a love found after death. Playthrough time should be approximately 10-15 minutes.

SFX: freesound.org, Taira Komori

Music: bensound.com, freestockmusic.com
